bibl.title: with contributions by Evie AHTARIDIS, Women's Letters from Ancient Egypt: 300 BC - AD 800.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction: This Book and How It Came to Be Written. - 2. Why Women's Letters? - 3. About the Corpus of Letters. - 4. Late Medieval Letters as Comparative Evidence. - 5.
